name: Sendbird - Salesforce - Case Create
description: A barebones Node.js app using Express to create Salesforce Cases and Sendbird Channels

SALESFORCE_API_VERSION.description: Version your Salesforce API is on - example - 41.0

SALESFORCE_SYSTEM_ADMINISTRATOR_EMAIL.description: Email of a Salesfore user with the role System Administator

SALESFORCE_SYSTEM_ADMINISTRATOR_AUTH.description: System admin's password + access token with no space between them

SENDBIRD_APP_ID.description: Found in front page of a Sendbird application, in your Sendbird Dashboard

SENDBIRD_API_TOKEN.description: Found in the general setting of a Sendbird application, in your Sendbird Dashboard. Consider to use only sub api tokens
